verbs.description: hardy fox [V: founding] [ARG0: member] of the residents dies at 73 hardy fox one of the founding members and creative forces behind the mysterious san francisco experimental rock collective the residents has died at the age of 73 for real this time the band confirmed the news in a statement on tuesday saying its composer and producer who had battled brain cancer succumbed to a brief illness the news came a month after fox preemptively announced his own death changing the epithet on his website to read 1945 - 2018 and sending a message to his mailing list that said probably the last of seeing me thanks for checking in san francisco chronicle founding member san francisco hardy fox
